column5: Situated on one of the most beautiful parts of the Frio River, the Barnaminium is a delightful retreat shared with El Zocalo’s Main House and La Vista on seven acres. Garner State Park is only a few minutes away but you may find is difficult to leave the tranquility of the Barnaminium as it’s a great place to just leave the world behind. The newly constructed guesthouse sits above the river with a private pathway down to the water. High season rates apply during the summer.
